CustomField.description: CONGA USE - Hidden field that determines the ID of the correct Conga Template for Order Form based on Region.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Account.Subsidiary_lookup__r.Name, "Bynder B.V.", "a463g000001MpahAAC", "Bynder LLC", "a463g000001MpamAAC", "Bynder Ltd.", "a463g000001MpaiAAC", "Bynder Pty Ltd", "a463g000001MpanAAC", CASE(Sales_Office__c, "San Mateo", "a463g000001MpamAAC", "San Carlos", "a463g000001MpamAAC", "Boston", "a463g000001MpamAAC", "Amsterdam", "a463g000001MpahAAC", "London", "a463g000001MpaiAAC", "Melbourne", "a463g000001MpanAAC", NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Conga Order Form Id
